history.text: Hi!  So we're supposed to talk about a movie.  Have you read the document about it yet?
Hi, the movie is the blind side
Hm.  The Blind Side.  What is the movie about?
It's a really great movie that's highly rated.
What kind of movie is it?
It's a biography, about a Football player.
Oh!  My husband likes football.  What year did it come out?
Starring Sandra Bullock, Tim McGraw and many others
it was released in 2009
Received an A+ on Cinemascore and 69% on rotten tomatoes
You should definitely watch it
Those are good reviews.  Where does the movie take place?
What is it rated?  Can my kids watch it with me?
It takes place in Memphis Tenessee
It sounds like a family movie.
Definitely does.  Do you know what football team the story is about?
The team at at Wingate Christian School

which is (a fictional representation of Briarcrest Christian School in

Memphis, Tennessee)

Oh!  I haven't heard of them before.  Fictional representation...I guess that makes sense why I had not heard of them
. Haha!
Is there a main character?
Yes the main character is Michael Oher, he has been in different  foster homes, and ends up playing football.
Sounds like it would be an inspiring movie.  How long is the movie?
Yeah definitely inspiring as there's a book written about it too.
Really?  Wow.  Must be a big movie.
Yeah, critics really praised Sandra Bullock's performance.
I think I'll look into watching it.  Sandra Bullock is one of my husband's favorite actresses.
Did she win any awards for it?
I wonder how much money it made. Do you know?
Well as a drama movie, with very good positive reviews, i'm sure she made lots of money
I'll definitely watch it with my family.  Sounds like a good movie for all of us.
I'm sure you will love it
Thank you for the information!
Glad you found it useful

uid1response.feedback: The chat was interesting.   They were informative and responsive.  (They understood most of my questions and answered them).  I will watch the movie again some day.  They were very supportive of it.
